extendedInfo.description: Official app for the 2011 Fall Meeting of the APS Division of Nuclear Physics, containing the scientific program, scheduler, maps and more! Meeting Dates: 10/26/11-10/29/11 Meeting Location: National Superconducting Cyclotron Laboratory Michigan State University East Lansing, MI

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Very simple and intuitive glad they have an app!  Suggestion, would be nice if your place was remembered in the talk list when hitting back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok, but...
reviews.comment: The app asks for rather extensive permissions. 3 stars because of the lack of explanations why, for example, it wants to read my contact list, or get my GPS location. I cannot fathom why that would be needed.
reviews.author: A Google User
